Maxime Vachier Lagrave vs Sam Shankland
Sinquefield Cup (2021),  Aug 22, Round 3
Giuoco Piano (C53)

1.e4 e5 2.Nf3 Nc6 3.Bc4 Bc5 4.c3 Nf6 5.d3 d6 6.O-O a6 7.a4 h6 8.Re1 Ba7 9.Nbd2 Be6 10.Bxe6 fxe6 11.Nf1 a5 12.Ng3 Qd7 13.Be3 Bxe3 14.Rxe3 g5 15.d4 O-O-O 16.d5 exd5 17.exd5 Ne7 18.c4 Ng4 19.Rb3 Rdf8 20.Qe1 b6 21.Rb5 Nxf2 22.Qxf2 g4 23.Nxe5 Qxb5 24.axb5 Rxf2 25.Kxf2 dxe5 26.Ke3 Rf8 27.Rf1 Rxf1 28.Nxf1 Nf5+ 29.Kd3 Kd7 30.Nd2 Nd6 31.Ne4 Ke7 32.Nxd6 cxd6 33.Ke4 Kf6 34.b3 Kg6 35.c5 dxc5 36.d6 Kf7 37.Kd5 e4 38.Kc6 e3 39.d7 e2 40.d8=Q e1=Q 41.Kxb6 Qe6+ 42.Ka7 c4 43.bxc4 a4 44.b6 a3 45.b7 a2 46.Qc7+ Kg6 47.Qa5

The Sinquefield Cup is a 10-player classical round-robin taking place in the Saint Louis Chess Club from 17-27 August 2021. It's the fifth and final stage of the 2021 Grand Chess Tour, a series of five events with a total prize fund of $1.275 million.

The players receive 90 minutes for 40 moves, followed by 30 minutes to the end of the game, plus a 30-second increment starting from move one. Official website: grandchesstour.org

00:00 Hello Everyone
00:35 FINAL ROUND!
01:45 Game Starts
02:40 Completely New Game
07:33 Pause The Video! 
08:35 Pause The Video 2!
